original_text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord, and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost, even from his mother's womb.
korean_text: 이는 그가 주 앞에 큰 자가 되며 포도주나 독한 술을 마시지 아니하며 모태로부터 성령의 충만함을 받아

sentences.original_text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 주 보시기에 위대하게 될 것임이라

sentences.original_text: and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink
and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost
